fields.name: Error_No_Approvers
fields.fieldText:
Note: If you see duplicate Approver names only select each name once.
If there are no approvers available in the box above please contact your Salesforce Administrator.

fields.fieldText:
Note: If you see duplicate Approver names only select each name once.
If there are no approvers available in the box above please contact your Salesforce Administrator.

Note: If you see duplicate Approver names only select each name once.

fields.name: Error_No_Approvers_0_1_0_0

fields.name: ThankYoueGreensheetText
fields.fieldText: Thank you, your eGreensheet selected approvers have been notified. Please press X to close this window.

fields.name: ThankYoueGreensheetText_0
fields.fieldText: Thank you, your eGreensheet selected approvers and notifications have been sent.

fields.name: WrongStatusMessage_0
fields.fieldText: Please populate the Product SBU and Sales Channel before generating the approver list.

fields.name: WrongStatusMessage
fields.fieldText: Cannot generate approver list when the status of the eGreensheet is {!v_Status}.

fields.name: MoreBAApprovers
fields.fieldText: Do you need to select more Business Approvers at a different tier?

fields.name: MoreCAApprovers
fields.fieldText: Do you need to select more Contract Approvers at a different tier?

fields.name: MoreCAApprovers_0
fields.fieldText: Do you need to select more Financial Approvers at a different tier?

fields.name: MoreCAApprovers_0_0
fields.fieldText: Do you need to select more Product Approvers at a different tier?

fields.name: DisplayOverallTierBA
fields.fieldText:
The overall approval level for this eGreensheet is {!v_TierInEgreensheet}.
What Approval Level do you need for Business Approvers?

fields.name: DisplayOverallTierBA_0
fields.fieldText:
The overall approval level for this eGreensheet is {!v_TierInEgreensheet}.
What Approval Level do you need for Contract Approvers?

fields.name: DisplayOverallTierFA
fields.fieldText:
The overall approval level for this eGreensheet is {!v_TierInEgreensheet}.

fields.name: YesOrNoNotify
fields.fieldText: Do you need to select users to notify about this eGreensheet?

fields.name: DisplayOverallTierPA
fields.fieldText:
The overall approval level for this eGreensheet is {!v_TierInEgreensheet}.
What Approval Level do you need for Product Approvers?

fields.name: WarningMessage
fields.fieldText: Warning: If you click Next the approvers will be created. Please click Previous if any further adjustments need to be made.

fields.name: WarningMessage_0
fields.fieldText: Warning: If you click Next the approvers will be created. Please click Previous if any further adjustments need to be made.

variables.description: This parameter is a concatenation of eg ID and Tier Chosen separated by a comma to send to the invocable method
